ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Indeed you are truly vast in character.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: For you are verily born of sublime nature.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and you are certainly on the most exalted standard of moral excellence.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: You have attained a high moral standard.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed you possess an exemplary character.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And verily, you are on an exalted character.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And most surely you conform (yourself) to sublime morality.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: surely thou art upon a mighty morality.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And lo! thou art of a tremendous nature.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: For you are truly of a sublime character.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And verily thou art of a high and noble disposition.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and indeed you possess a great character.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And thou (standest) on an exalted standard of character.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And verily, you (O Muhammad SAW) are on an exalted standard of character.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Surely, you (Prophet Muhammad) are of a great morality.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And you are of a great moral character.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And indeed, you are of a great moral character.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [68:4] And assuredly you possess a magnificent nature, [a magnificent] religion.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And lo! thou art) O Muhammad (of a tremendous nature) following a noble religion which is honoured by Allah; it is also said this means: you have great character traits with which Allah has honoured you.
